component.name: Slavolt
component.summary: Better integration of Slack, with desktop environments

description.p: Slavolt is a small application which wraps Slack to provide better integration with desktop environments in general, and GNOME in particular:

ul.li: Having Slack as a “standalone” application instead of it living in a browser tab
Persistent notifications (for desktop environments supporting them, i.e. GNOME)
Notifications are automatically prevented when the Slavolt window is focused
Status icon for desktop environment which have a tray bar applet (XFCE, Budgie, likely many others)
